content.rendered:
> FV18 is a multi-biometric reader capable of capturing and processing finger vein and fingerprint
Biometric data at the same time. The new hardware platform uses the zmm220 motherboard with 1.2 GhzCPU. With the optimization of both the hardware platform and the algorithm, FV18 is one of the high recognition rates, high security and high-speed terminal. The device provides flexibility in both independent installation and installation with any external access control panels that support the standard Wiegand signal.

deteils

Display 2.4-inch TFT LCD Color Screen
Fingerprint Capacity 1,000
Vein Capacity 1,000
Card Capacity 5,000 (Optional) ID / Mifare / HID Proximity card / iCLASS card
Transaction Capacity 100,000
Sensor ZK Finger vein senor
Algorithm Version ZKFinger VX10.0, ZKFingerVein VX3.0
Communication TCP / IP, USB-host, WIFI (Optional)
Access Control Interface 3rd Party Electric Lock, Door Sensor, Exit Button, Alarm, Doorbell
Wiegand Signal Input and Output, SRB
Aux. Input 1ea for linkage function
Functions DST, Record Query, Anti-passback
Optional Functions Webserver, WorkCode, Printer, Wireless Doorbell
Power Supply 12V DC, 3A
Operating Temperature 0 °C- 45 °C
Operating Humidity 20%-80%
SDK and Software Standalone SDK, ZKAccess3.5 software
Dimension(L x W x H) 210.9 x 80.1 x 96mm

excerpt.rendered:
* Multi-biometric reader with finger and fingerprint authentication ؛
* Full access control options: web server (optional) anti-rollback
• Third-party lock reading control interface, door sensor exit button, alarm and doorbell
* Unprecedented performance with high accuracy of fingerprint recognition technology
• New firmware: adopts a new firmware that optimizes various functions
A flexible user privilege set is supported above the levels
